author: dmitrijus
body:
Also fix a mistake made in previous commit.
These statics _were_ actually used to store data in between the invocations.
Fixed by making them class members.

Related PR: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/12495
title: Fix an invalid use of a 'static' keyword in DQM/HcalDetDiagPedestalMonitor
